text: Tumi munaphikasakalara prati laksya karaa na'ine? Sihamte ahale kitabasakalara majara paraa yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamtara se'isakala bhatrka kaya, ‘tomaloke yadi bahiskrta horaa, tente ami'o tomalokara lagata niscaya desa tyaga karaima arau ami tomalokara bisaye ketiya'o karao anugatya nakaraima arau tomalokara lagata yud'dha ha’le ami niscaya tomalokara sahaya karaima’. Kintu allahe saksya diye ye, niscaya sihamta ghora michaliya
